bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Application of Power Apparatus Bushings
Redline
IEEE Guide for Application of Power Apparatus Bushings - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.19.100-2012 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.19.100-1995) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Guidance on the use of outdoor power apparatus bushings is provided. The bushings are limited to those built in accordance with IEEE Std C57.19.00-1991. General information and recommendations for the application of power apparatus bushings when incorporated as part of power transformers, power circuit breakers, and isolated-phase bus are provided.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
